skills.name: Install PostCSS
skills.pattern: npm install postcss postcss-cli

skills.name: Config File
CLI Usage
skills.pattern: npx postcss input.css -o output.css

skills.name: Autoprefixer
skills.pattern:
npm install autoprefixer
// Adds -webkit-, -moz-, etc. automatically

skills.name: cssnano
skills.pattern:
npm install cssnano
// Minifies and optimizes CSS

skills.name: postcss-preset-env
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-preset-env
// Use future CSS features today

skills.name: postcss-import
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-import
@import 'components/button.css';

skills.name: postcss-nested
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-nested
.card { .title { font-size: 20px; } }

skills.name: postcss-mixins
postcss-simple-vars
postcss-custom-properties
postcss-calc
postcss-color-function
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-color-function
color: color(blue lightness(+20%));

skills.name: postcss-custom-media
skills.pattern:
@custom-media --small-viewport (max-width: 30em);
@media (--small-viewport) { ... }

skills.name: postcss-pxtorem
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-pxtorem
// Converts px values to rem

skills.name: postcss-url
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-url
// Rebases, inlines, or copies URL assets

skills.name: postcss-sorting
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-sorting
// Sorts CSS properties

skills.name: postcss-focus-visible
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-focus-visible
// Adds :focus-visible polyfill

skills.name: stylelint
skills.pattern:
npm install stylelint
// Lint CSS/PostCSS

skills.name: Vite Integration
skills.pattern: // vite.config.js - PostCSS auto-loaded from postcss.config.js

skills.name: Webpack Integration
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-loader
{ test: /\.css$/, use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader', 'postcss-loader'] }

skills.name: JavaScript API
skills.pattern:
const postcss = require('postcss');
postcss([autoprefixer]).process(css).then(result => { ... })

skills.name: Plugin API
skills.pattern: module.exports = () => ({ postcssPlugin: 'my-plugin', Declaration(decl) { ... } })

skills.name: AST Manipulation
skills.pattern:
// Walk through declarations
root.walkDecls('color', decl => { decl.value = 'blue' })

skills.name: Root/Rule/Declaration
skills.pattern:
// Root contains Rules, Rules contain Declarations
root.append({ selector: '.new', nodes: [...] })

skills.name: Source Maps
skills.pattern: postcss([...]).process(css, { from: 'src/app.css', to: 'dist/app.css', map: { inline: false } })

skills.name: Browserslist
skills.pattern:
// package.json or .browserslistrc
"browserslist": ["last 2 versions", "> 1%"]

skills.name: Tailwind CSS
skills.pattern:
npm install tailwindcss
// PostCSS processes @tailwind directives

skills.name: PurgeCSS
skills.pattern:
npm install @fullhuman/postcss-purgecss
// Removes unused CSS

skills.name: postcss-reporter
skills.pattern:
npm install postcss-reporter
// Logs warnings from plugins
